title: Minimum Time to Make All Numbers Even
description:
Given a list of integers, you need to find the minimum number of operations needed to make all numbers even. An operation is defined as increasing a number by 1.

#### Function Signature
```python
def min_operations(nums: list[int]) -> int:
```

#### Input
- `nums` (list[int]): A list of integers.

#### Output
- Returns the minimum number of operations needed to make all numbers in the input list even.
